name: Crazy Race (itch) (Demo20)
description:
Game make for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Objective:

The chaos is raising....

Drag and Drop the cars to prevent from crashing.

Personal objective:

As I was in town and didn't have a nice pc, I had to work with my laptop, so in order to avoid and explosion I challenge myself to make a game with "Python" using "Pygame" as the graphics library. The result is not perfect, but I was almost learning Pygame from the beginning and I'm proud of what I have done, as I have to deal with lot of problems and errors that I had to solve without research, as there is low signal in my village. Hope you enjoy the game (may be a bit hard) :D
